languages.text: "Я исполнял приказ". {n}Губы упрямо сжаты.{/n} "Но это не снимает с меня вины. Я вас подвел".
"I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."
languages.original_text: "Я исполнял приказ". {n}Губы упрямо сжаты.{/n} "Но это не снимает с меня вины. Я вас подвел".

traits.locale_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."
"I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

"I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."
"I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

languages.text: « Je ne faisais que suivre les ordres, {n}réplique-t-il en serrant les lèvres avec obstination,{/n} mais cela ne m'absout pas de ma culpabilité. Je n'ai pas été capable de combler vos attentes. »
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne faisais que suivre les ordres, {n}réplique-t-il en serrant les lèvres avec obstination,{/n} mais cela ne m'absout pas de ma culpabilité. Je n'ai pas été capable de combler vos attentes. »

languages.text: 「命令に従っていただけです」{n}彼は頑なに唇を引き結んだ。{/n}「ですが、それで自分の罪が消えるわけではありません。私はあなたを裏切りました」
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

traits.locale_text: 「命令に従っていただけです」{n}彼は頑なに唇を引き結んだ。{/n}「ですが、それで自分の罪が消えるわけではありません。私はあなたを裏切りました」

languages.text: «Solo seguía órdenes». {n}Aprieta con firmeza los labios.{/n} «Pero eso no me exime de culpa. Le he fallado».
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

traits.locale_text: «Solo seguía órdenes». {n}Aprieta con firmeza los labios.{/n} «Pero eso no me exime de culpa. Le he fallado».

languages.text: “我是在奉命行事。”{n}他固执地绷紧了嘴唇。{/n}“但话虽如此，这并不能免除我的罪责。是我辜负了你。”
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

traits.locale_text: “我是在奉命行事。”{n}他固执地绷紧了嘴唇。{/n}“但话虽如此，这并不能免除我的罪责。是我辜负了你。”

languages.text: "Emirlerimi yerine getiriyordum." {n}Dudakları inatla geriliyor.{/n} "Tabii bu durum beni aklamaz. Size ihanet ettim."
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."

traits.locale_text: "Emirlerimi yerine getiriyordum." {n}Dudakları inatla geriliyor.{/n} "Tabii bu, beni aklamaz. Size ihanet ettim."

languages.text: "Ich habe Befehle befolgt." {n}Er schließt störrisch seinen Mund.{/n} "Aber das befreit mich nicht von meiner Schuld. Ich habe Euch enttäuscht.
languages.original_text: "I was following orders." {n}His lips tighten stubbornly.{/n} "But that doesn't absolve me of my guilt. I failed you."
